BRING BACK THE HATCH, IM SO TIRED OF GETTING INTO GAMES WHERE PEOPLE QUIT OR DONT PLAY AND I GO DOWN BECAUSE OF IT... AT LEAST WITH THE HATCH I CAN GET OUT AFTER DOING A GEN OR TWO... GAMES GETTING RUINED BECAUSE OF THE INABILITY TO ACTUALLY PLAY
This game is so fun to play with friends and alone (alone as killer). I can never seem to get bored of the wide amount of content this game provides.

Kill your friends, kill your enemies or....
DO THE LOOPS!

This game could be fun and it could be great, if the devs and whoevers in charge of most of the decisions the company made the right ones, but at every turn they become greedier and lazier. While they may have implemented a few things, they took several years to add or fix things that shouldn't have taken so long. While they may have not been directly selling NFTs they definitely suppported them with the pinhead dlc which says alot. With the recent halloween event it was a reskin of a previous with added random pumpkins that may or may not give you a decent amount of bloodpoints. On the topic of bloodpoints its an insane grind that they havent really fixed at all, with my almost 200 hours in this game I barely have about 10 full survivor perks unlocked for all my survivors to use which amounts to 30. While playing killer you can get about 2x as much BP from a single game playing well along with BBQ multiplying that score after the BP is totalled up, but even then the grind is incredibly painful just to RNG get the killer or survivor perks you unlocked especially since now Demigorgon, Nancy, and Steve perks are now unlocked for everyone.

TLDR dont buy this game it sucks, devs dont deserve your money

Meh... I don't see why this game is so popular. I have never been so bored playing a game before. You do the same shit over and over again. There is nothing new in this, and no story in it. Would not reccomend this at all.

Game released in 2016; Was funny and buggy by then.
Now, has been 6 years already, the game is still funny and buggy nowadays.
Behaviour refuses to fix some major issues such as:
- Inconsistent animations.
- Client-server communication inconsistencies.
- Almost no performance settings in-game.
- Input lag issues.
- Hit boxes issues.
- etc.

Not to mention how toxic the game gets every single time the meta got broken by new content releases.
In conclusion: This is by no means a competitive game, as much, if you only wants to get fun, you may go ahead and buy it, but, do not get invested in it, it's not worth it.

with the recent update the game completely punishes the survivors. i do agree with some of the nerfs to some of the perks as a survivor main like dead hard etc etc but now the game punishes the solo players who play survivor by increasing the gen repair speed. the update ruined the game more to the point the killers are guaranteed 2 kills per match if not easy 4k for the killers. and face camping and tunneling exist more than ever this game started off fun but after this recent update the game is garbage at the state until another patch or something comes out im pretty sure all my survivor mains are feeling the pain especially the solo players.
fun game, but really needs to fix the bugs. I have to close out the game often because the loading screens
i randomly crash and the queues are way to long
Fix this damn game, thank you.

Love this game being playing since it came out for free on ps4 didn't play much but once my good friend finley got it i started playing more got to rank 5 for the first time looking to get in to playing it again very fun skill game. overall 5/5
Should change the name of the game to Hacked by Daylight. They don't give a sh*t about cheaters.

First off let me start off by saying if you do not have a party of at least 3 friends this game is not worth getting. The Ranking system is garbage,  The Matchmaking does not make sense, For instance you can be a high ranked player however you do not get matched with players with the same skill level, so what ends up happening is someone either has to kill themselves or you have to carry the team. The game at the moment is terribly balanced. Lastly it takes 10 minutes most of the time to even get in a match and for this i give it a negative rating.

Edit: I am incredibly disappointed with BVHR and their complete inability to listen to those playing their games. For me and for many others severe lag and bugs have made the game virtually unplayable. After the portrait of a murder chapter i had minor bugs, but nothing too major. But the recent christmas event, and after said event ended, has caused the game to be incredibly difficult to play. The game will freeze for long amounts of time. I would finish repairing the generator, but instead of it finishing, i would get stuck repairing the generator even when i let go. While being chased by the killer it would appear that i am out of reach, then i would get hit or downed with the killer's animation being delayed, making it impossible to loop killers. With both survivor and killer i would be moving around the map and would be glitched backwards, usually into a tree or smth. This is just what i can remember off of the top of my head. It is incredibly disappointing to see a game i loved so much become unplayable. SBMM annoyed me, the NFT situation was horrendous, and now there are too many bugs to play the game as intended. and BHVR seems to not care at all. People with thousands of hours are uninstalling the game, and yet instead of fixing existing issues they keep adding more content, which breaks it more. I bought so many DLCS, and i havent even had the chance to utilise most of them. All 400+ hours i spent playing this game have gone to waste. I will not be playing this game for a long while, and may even uninstall. I'm sick of waiting for the fixes this game needs because they will never come.

Original review:
 Incredibly addicting and a lot of fun. Incredibly high skill ceiling, so much so that i have almost 400 hours in-game and am still nowhere near the skill of a lot of others. The original killers are unique and fun, and most of the licensed ones are well translated (note the "most". if you're here because you want to play freddy youll be dissapointed). 
There are a fair share of bugs, toxic players, and a stale meta. The game is very much sided towards the survivors.
It can be frustrating and many times i have had breaks from the game as it has gotten a bit much, but the fun moments of the game make it worth it.
Incredible game fun solo or with friends. Just don't play ghost face ^-^
